speedrunapi.config.worldpreview.option.c: Limits the radius around the player spawn in which chunks will be sent to the preview.
speedrunapi.config.worldpreview.option.i:
By default, Sodium requires chunks to have all their neighbours loaded before rendering a chunk to ensure all data is present.
This option removes that requirement for chunks within the given distance.
This might cause Sodium to have to rebuild chunks when the neighbours are added, so use with caution!
speedrunapi.config.worldpreview.option.d: Limits the amount of packets that get processed each frame of the preview.
